title: Mid-Level Leader Leadership Development: Blended Learning-Based Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic leadership concepts and team collaboration experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning program focusing on strengthening intermediate leadership competencies in mathematics education. Emphasizes practical application through peer coaching and school-institution-linked activities.

learning_goals: Within six months, learners successfully execute effective decision-making processes three or more times in team project leadership scenarios
In blended learning environments, learners write two or more leadership improvement plans incorporating peer feedback
As mid-level leaders in mathematics education, learners design and implement one or more real-world school-linked projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
